title: 1. Load Software

1.  **Add Software Tools to your computer:**

    1.  [Github Desktop](https://desktop.github.com/)

        -   Sign [User Agreement](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1yP0mLpD5d5rsgNv5-_Z6OWpwhLROjxMg/view) (see [NOAA Github Governance Team](https://sites.google.com/noaa.gov/nmfs-st-github-governance-team/github-users) for more information)
        -   [SEFSC specific user agreement](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HQBJFCa55inDFNdB-TEYkEw6h0rUPAG0/view); [NEFSC specific user agreement](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YBD_tZQ0zTjG6FkClegp2N-joDjB8tBg/view?usp=drive_link)

    2.  [RStudio](https://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download) (v2022.07.2 build 576 or later)

    3.  [R](https://www.r-project.org/)

    4.  [Zotero](https://www.zotero.org/)

    5.  Create a [Github Account](https://github.com/)
